{{disambig-two|a river in the early legendarium|Sindarin word|[[nen]]}}
'''Nen''' was the name of a great river of [[Valinor]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref>{{PE|15}}, p. 14</ref> Nothing else is known about it, nor is there an equivalent river in the later legendarium.

== Etymology ==
The name ''Nen'' is in [[Qenya]]. It means "river, water".<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-3207724789.html|articlename=á´±Q. ''nen (nend-)'' n.|website=Eldamo|accessed=11 April 2022}}</ref> 

In the ''[[Qenya Lexicon]]'' appears the [[root]] [[NENE]] ("flow?"), from which the word ''nen'' is derived from.<ref>{{PE|12}}, p. 65</ref>
